lexUnit.name: experiment.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to determine whether a hypothesis is correct by conducting a test or experiment

sentence.text: He studied how seeds could be carried in the mud clinging to the feet of birds , and also experimented on how long seeds could remain immersed in salt water and still be fertile .
